name: system-notification-logical-test-case-added
description: System default template for logical test case addition notifications
templateBody:
{{#if (eq channel 'email')}}Hello {{recipientName}},

{{/if}}[{{publisherName}}] {{event.userName}} added logical test cases to {{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{#if (eq channel 'email')}}

Happy Exploring!
Thanks.{{/if}}
